about.paragraph_3: I am a web developer who enjoys imagining and creating interactive and dynamic websites. I work as a teacher and enjoy getting involved with groups that have a common goal.
about.paragraph_4: My vision as a developer is focused on providing solutions and support organizations with projects in progress and small companies looking forward to build their own responsive website. These are some of the technologies with which I worked in recent years:
about.paragraph_5: I appreciate your visit and I hope you can enjoy here.

footer.title: CONTACT ME
footer.description: I am interested in freelance opportunities related to web design, video games and data management. However, if you have other request or any question, don’t hesitate to feel use the form.
